title: Impressions
description: Tracks when impressions are presented on a site, along with names, types, and counts.

xdm:displays.title: Displays
xdm:displays.description: Counts the number of times an impression item has been displayed to a visitor.

xdm:ID.title: ID
xdm:ID.description: Tracks the ID of an item in an impression array.

xdm:type.title: Type
xdm:type.description: Tracks the type of impression in an impression array.

xdm:selected.title: Selected
xdm:selected.description: Tracks when a given item in an impression array has been selected or clicked.
